grading_explanation.practical_foundation: 2.8/3 – 25 of 35 fields filled (71% completion). Higher completion indicates better self-awareness and thoroughness.
grading_explanation.technical_competency: 2.0/2 – Strong technical foundation with relevant skills for target field (Python, machine learning, deep learning, and data analysis)
grading_explanation.hands_on_experience: 2.5/3 – 1 solid internship at COTHON Solutions + projects (ConvAi, Project 11, Face and QR attendance) with real-world applications
grading_explanation.growth_potential: 1.5/2 – Some leadership experience (participation in university coding and AI clubs, organizing and participating in tech fests, hackathons, and social initiatives) + demonstrated learning initiative

hiring_insights.strongest_assets: Strong technical foundation, relevant hands-on experience, and growth potential through extracurricular activities
hiring_insights.development_areas: Clearly defining roles and responsibilities in projects, showcasing more specific examples of leadership experiences, and providing details about acquired soft skills and technical skills beyond programming languages
hiring_insights.industry_readiness: Good industry readiness with a strong foundation in AI, ML, and data science. Needs some refinement to fully demonstrate employability potential.

grading_debug.notes: Candidate has a strong technical foundation and relevant hands-on experience, but could benefit from more specific project examples and leadership role details to demonstrate employability potential.
